reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress elegant and meticulously crafted, with thick fabric that drapes elegantly.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: I wore this dress to a wedding and received non-stop compliments all night! The dusty blue color is stunning, and the velvet is incredibly soft with zero shedding or bald spots. The quality is outstandingâ€”thick, luxurious material with just the right amount of stretch. As someone who is very curvy, I appreciated how flattering and forgiving it was without ever feeling restrictive. It was genuinely comfortable to wear, walk, and dance in the entire night. I loved the adjustable skinny strap (which I think would be easy to tuck in if you prefer a true one-shoulder look) - it gave me total confidence with a strapless bra. The zipper-controlled side slit is so cool â€” you decide exactly how high it goes, and it stayed perfectly in place all night (no creeping up, even with lots of walking around/dancing). Length was spot-on for my 5'2" frame in 2.5" heels: long and elegant, hitting just below the ankle with my shoes fully visible and no risk of tripping. Keep in mind I have wide hips and a bigger butt, which tends to shorten dresses a bit, so it may run longer on someone with a straighter silhouette. I didnâ€™t manage to get great full-length photos, but I hope this review helps! Read more
items.author: Melissa J Gentile

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, flattering and elegant
items.body: If you are in between sizes, size down. Iâ€™m generally a small but the XS fit perfectly while the S could do but was loose in the waist (5 ft and 112 lbs). The pink is nicer and more elegant in person while still being lively. The skirt is a thinner material but given itâ€™s a black, glittery material it provides full coverage. The dress is stunning and form fitting with stretch so it flatters and hugs your curves. The skirt zipper is such a great addition - you can unzip it more if you want a sexier and more sultry look, or zip it more if you prefer. With 3 inch heels the length was fine - probably will hem it about an inch. As far as quality, it looks great. I have a similar, brand name dress and the quality of the brand name one is better as far as having a slip layer and thick material that looks very luxe while on. However, this dress looks great too relative to its price and the color scheme makes it stand out in a good way. This can be worn to a formal wedding, a gala, or any formal event and it looks great. So if putting it next to the brand name dress and touching the fabric, yes the brand name ones feels more luxe and classic. Once on, however, this looks great and high quality. Read more
items.author: Yolanda O.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Curves and velvet for daaaayyyss!
items.body: This dress is gorgeous ðŸ˜ I danced all night in it, it was comfortable with beautiful velvet fabric. The blue is darker than the picture. Its more of a navy, almost black. The picture is more royal blue. Its still worth every penny considering its a long formal gown. I was having fun with the slit up the front of the dress. You can make the slit short starting from below the knees or go it as high as your panty line! There are no pockets in the dress. The dress is true to size. I am a size 10 and large fit like a glove, hugging every curve of my body. I would not pass on this deal and I am thinking of getting one in red! Read more
items.author: Halo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute details and super comfy!
items.body: This dress was everything I hoped for and shocked people when I told them it was from Amazon. I wore it to a Met Gala themed holiday party and won best dressed couple with my husband. The red color, the jewels, the ruffles bring a uniqueness and flair that made me feel fancy. The fabric was soft, decent thickness, and stretchy and was comfortable all night. I am 5â€™3 and about 125 lbs, the small fit perfectly. I almost forgot my favorite featureâ€¦ the slit has a zipper so you can adjust the height to your preference! Read more
items.author: Kacey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, Modest, Comfy and well-made-Love it!
items.body: Elegant, modest, comfy, and well-made â€” I love it! I received so many compliments while wearing this dress â€” even had a friend ask me to send her the link so she could order one too! Had my In-laws 50th wedding anniversary and this was my dress! Iâ€™m 5'4", 130 lbs, and I ordered a size Small in Red. I paired it with low 4-inch chunky nude heels, and it was the perfect length. The material is thick, Stretchy, Thick fabric not see through at all, flowy, and feels high-quality. Itâ€™s also true to size. I pulled the straps as high as possible for fuller chest coverage and zipped the front slit zipper halfway up for modesty and comfort â€” it worked perfectly. I plan to buy it again in black! LOVELY DRESS Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Beautiful. Very good material and soft so it fell beautiful. Read more
items.author: SHALIZA ALI

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it!
items.body: Amazing dress. Reasonable stretch. Not sheer at all, rather a heavier material making it feel higher quality. I wore this to my brothers wedding in December and was complimented all evening. I felt beautiful and so comfortable in this dress. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A flattering dress
items.body: This dress is extremely flattering. It hugs in all the right places making for a sexy fit. It is stretchy ans the material is NOT thin. This is a simple dress, but also elegant looking. I wore this to the Marine Corp Ball and received many compliments. I did add a thin gold belt which added some pop to it. Read more
items.author: Stacy A.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Formal Maxi One Shoulder Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Formal Maxi One Shoulder Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dusty Blue Velvet, Sparkly Red, Sparkly Sage Green, Sparkly Black, Sparkly Royal Blue, Brown Velvet, Sparkly Dark Green, Sparkly Sage Green B, Sparkly Dark Blue, Sparkly Peacock Blue, Sparkly Black With Floral Print, Sparkly Hot Pink and Black, Sparkly Blue and Black, Sparkly Hot Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
